property.label: welcome_text
property.about: The main text, this isn't actually used.
property.value:
Welcome to the yorker experience! Settle in and make this your own home by clicking here. If you'd like to control your homepage then register right away.
That's it, it's all yours. If you're still lost check out the About Us section for more on what we do and why. Stay with us and help us make this a fantastic home.
